reviewText: This was an excellent portrayl of a middle-aged man's flashbacks and longing for his first love. I am sure that this premise is quite unique for the tangibles he encounters makes him remember that sheer passion he experienced with his first love. Although one has numerous relationships over the course of a lifetime, it is the first one that had a thrilling uniqueness, the kind that sends butterflies in your stomach. There is an abundance of passionate sex and tasteful nudity, which in the case of this film, enhances it.
